name: The Dark Place
description:
Created by Team Ambiguous Darkness which includes:

Costas: Lighting Editor, Monster  and Scene Editor

Chan: Sound and Video Editor

Daniel: 3D Modeler 

The Dark Place follows the attempts of a child to escape from the clutches of a demonic figure which appears in its home in the place of the child's parents. You must evade the demon at all costs, lest it take you like it did your parents.

Use the WASD keys to move around and the SHIFT key to sprint. Good Luck.
